item.title: Im fixing to burn my server source lol... -.-
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Guys, it wont work unless his silab items are done properly, i suggest you read the tut in Tutorial section, by Tico135…

Basically, you have to change your items from 10000, to 20000…

Search 10000, in client.java, you might get something like this, or similar…

				int item = playerEquipment[r];
				if((item > 0) && (item < 10000)) {

Change 10000, to 20000… And keep doing the same… Next go to Item.Java, and search for…

	public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[10000];

You should see…

	public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[10000];
	public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[10000];
	public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[10000];
	public static boolean[] itemTradeable = new boolean[10000];
	public static boolean[] itemSellable = new boolean[10000];

Change that to…

	public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[11999];
	public static boolean[] itemIsNote = new boolean[11999];
	public static boolean[] itemTwoHanded = new boolean[11999];
	public static boolean[] itemTradeable = new boolean[11999];
	public static boolean[] itemSellable = new boolean[11999];

And ur like done? …
You also might need to open ItemHandler… Search for

	public static int DropItemCount = 0;
	public static int MaxDropItems = 100000;
	public static int MaxListedItems = 10000;

You might need to change

	public static int MaxListedItems = 10000;

To…

	public static int MaxListedItems = 20000;
  • Lol this is a just a brief, i take no creds… Look @ Tutorial section for a more detailed explanation

H2H

Read full topic
